item.title: Money and Cost of Living in Taiwan
item.description: MONEY AND COST CURRENCY The official currency of Taiwan is the New Taiwan dollar (TWD). Key points about the currency: Currency code: TWD Abbreviations: NT$, NTD$ Common denominations: NT$100, NT$500, NT$1000 bills; NT$50, NT$10, NT$5, NT$1 coins Cash payment is prevalent, with credit cards, Easy Card, and iPass also widely accepted. AVERAGE EXPENDITURE IN TAIWAN Average monthly expenditure in major cities (for reference only): Taipei: NT$28,550 New Taipei City: NT$22,419 Taichung: NT$23,267 Kaohsiung: NT$21,674 Tainan: NT$19,536 TUITION FEES Tuition fees in Taiwan vary depending on the program and university:
